ygData.subject: Re: Efrieum
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, Unfortunately I had to quit EQ and wanted to stay I really enjoyed being on the list, but now how do I remove myself? Thanks Dan ... From: Monica
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,
Unfortunately I had to quit EQ and wanted to stay I really enjoyed being on
the list, but now how do I remove myself?
Thanks
Dan
----- Original Message -----
From: Monica Bradlee <mbradlee@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 02, 1999 6:04 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Efrieum


> From: Monica Bradlee <mbradlee@...>
>
> It had an axe graphic I was there and he charmed him maybe a week ago,
weekend
> sometime. The person who looted it never mentioned it not being the exe
axe and
> this is the first time I have ever heard of a critter not having a graphic
for a
> weapon it has, it was also my second time in lower guk. As for the pet
thing it
> may have been a fluke I don't know as I don't play anything that uses pets
so I
> can't tell you, but I did clearly see from the executioner "guarding with
my
> life oh splendid one" Mersinaz even laughed because we didn't know what he
was
> doing at first. AND WHEN YOU ARE GOING TO INSULT ME AT LEAST GET THE NAME
> SPELLED RIGHT!!!! As for the pets I am pretty sure the guy who has the
> information attained it though illegal methods because he seems very
greasy and
> probably won't ever tell me but I am gonna try and when I get it the
person who
> doubted me doesn't have to use it
>
> Efrieum
> 35 warrior
> by the way congratulations Piip on 34
>
>
